title: Fiddlesticks is cancer
body: And so is every other champ with fear in this game. But what I really don't understand is why he's allowed to have a free flash whenever his ult is up. With the exception of talon, almost every other champ has to burn flash if they want to jump over terrain like he's able to.

replies.body: Im happy he isnt "meta" tbh.. His cc (which can make you useless for 3.5s total) has 0 actual counterplay and ever since his W cd got reduced to 3 seconds its like... what do you do? Even if you interrupt his drain its gonna be back up in like 1-2s lol feelsbadman

He does not have a free flash. His ult has a several second channel time, making it completely useless unless he is using it from stealth. Maybe if you used wards...
How is a fear any different from a point-and-click stun?

He is annoying, but has very clear and obvious counterplay. Do not cluster for his E, stay away from other targets and you remove almost all his damage output, and do not hug unwarded brush.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bT2JZcAh,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-01-13T01:52:29.631+0000)
>
> He does not have a free flash. His ult has a several second channel time, making it completely useless unless he is using it from stealth. Maybe if you used wards...
> 
> How is a fear any different from a point-and-click stun?

Explain how he's able to get over walls if he doesn't have a free flash. And how many other point and click cc abilities have the range that Fiddle's fear has? I can't think of a single point and click cc with that much range.

> 
> And these arent even all of them, rengar can jump to enemies, amu can go through to enemies, etc.
> 
> Also what about {{summoner:12}}. Isnt that basically just another flash?

Most of those champs don't burst you while they "flash". Fiddlesticks can flash and AOE burst everyone at the same time. It's dumb.
